displayName.text: The Office of Chief Medical Examiner

formattedAddress: 421 E 26th St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 421 E 26th St, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: If an autopsy is performed on  your loved one, be advised that the toxicology report may take about 3-4 months.   The official cause of death can not be determined until they complete the tests so you will not have access to a completed death certificate.  If your loved one owned an insurance policy, you will not be able to access it to cover the funeral expenses without the cause of death stated on the certificate.  You can incur fees from a funeral home , while you wait.   This is a city agency with a multimillion dollar budget and they can expedite the process if more citizens voiced their concerns.

text.text: If an autopsy is performed on  your loved one, be advised that the toxicology report may take about 3-4 months.   The official cause of death can not be determined until they complete the tests so you will not have access to a completed death certificate.  If your loved one owned an insurance policy, you will not be able to access it to cover the funeral expenses without the cause of death stated on the certificate.  You can incur fees from a funeral home , while you wait.   This is a city agency with a multimillion dollar budget and they can expedite the process if more citizens voiced their concerns.

originalText.text: My dad passed July 29th in the hospital Yesterday the Dr Singh of St Johns called me to tell me the Medical Examiner would not sign off I immediately said so do an autopsy Then she had the Medical Examiner (a woman)called me to ask me about trauma my dad may or may not have experienced I explained he was in the care of Beach Gardens Nursing Facility so I was unaware and suggested an autopsy She asked a few more questions and then told me to call the hospital back to request an autopsy I did only to have a male doctor from St Johns hospital calls me today to say I would have to hire a private doctor to perform the autopsy even though the m/e he spoke to suggests it He said Ms Singh didnâ€™t know what she was talking about and was new Then a different woman from the medical examiners office calls me and says o sorry there was miscommunication we are signing off on the release I said what changed she says o no it was just miscommunication I explained what happened I spoke of the trauma the prior person stated was on His bottom she didnâ€™t know I knew that and now she says o no that nothing weâ€™ve figured it out now I said is this your way of dismissing me I said at a time of grieving and preparing to say my final goodbyes you call me causing me more stress and grief only to say o well I said at this point an autopsy should be done bcs you have come and created all sort of thought distortion in a person who isnâ€™t only grieving but also has mental issues I need my mind placed at ease and all she did was pass blame to the hospital and dismiss me I am literally boiling ðŸ¥µ These people are supposed to be professional and this was definitely not I know now that something happened to my dad but I canâ€™t prove it without the autopsy which I canâ€™t afford I emotionally and mentally stressed beyond words thanks to not one but four â€œprofessional â€œindividuals

originalText.text: I spoke to Nori Williams (Genetic Counselor) she was very understanding and helpful with explaining the loss of a loved one in my family. Before you come in be sure to have your IDs with you to sign in, have an appointment and direct phone line to the person you are trying to get in get in touch with or contact. There was one person in the front desk lobby and they were very strict and up tight.

originalText.text: Very questionable hiring process at this organization that somebody should look into. I have made sure to save records of what they do if anybody wants to know, simply email me. Whenever you submit an application indicating that you are from a specific race, and even provide proof of the necessary qualifications they still turn you down, if you indicate any other race on the application with the same qualifications they give you a call. I couldn't understand it at first but now it makes sense.

originalText.text: My son is their for soon on Aug 18 2018 his family did not go too count too give me paper  i had it set up on Jan 22 2018 and his sister said she had did it so I put the body  on hold their never did nothing so why he still their I never hear their that crazy
